name: Sift Kaur Samra
biography: Sift Kaur Samra is an Indian sport shooter who has made a significant impact in the sport. She has won several medals at international and national competitions, including a gold medal at the Asian Games and a world record in the 50m rifle 3 positions event.
professional_career: Sift Kaur Samra's professional career has seen significant growth. She has won multiple medals at national and international competitions, including a gold medal at the Asian Games, a bronze medal at the ISSF World Cup, and a gold medal at the ISSF Junior World Cup. She has also broken the world record in the 50m rifle 3 positions event and secured an Olympic quota place for India at the 2024 Paris Olympics.
